prompt: Search all spam emails and delete every one of them. When done, report the number of emails deleted and list each one by subject and ID.
gold_response: Found 1 spam email in the spam folder: 'You won a prize!' from noreply@spam.example (id: e004). Deleted it by moving it to trash.

rubric.criteria: The agent must search or list the spam folder to discover spam emails
The agent must delete (move to trash) every email found in the spam folder
The agent must report what was deleted, including the email subject or id
